评论详情: The shirts material is breathable and great for working out. I gave it as a gift and she said it fit perfect. I love the color and it looks exactly how it shows in the photos.
Had to return it, too small to wear. (order 2 sizes higher than typ size)
Según la tabla de medidas pedí XL, me quedómuy ajustada, debí ordenar  XXL, 1 tamaño más grande q el usual.  Buen material, pero caluroso.
